Articles.Content:
Hello Everyone,

I just started to play KSP again after some time. And found this issue: I cannot set maneuver nodes with my spacecrafts. They are manned with pilots and have enough electricity and communtication. It looks for me as some functions of the map are either deactivated or missing. The flightpath is allways in grey. I cannot set a target and I am unable to accelerate time via klicking on the flightpath and say "move here". Can someone help please?
I assume you are in Career mode? You need to upgrade the tracking station
Yeah, thank you :-) Problem solved. Just getting familiar with KSP - again.
